trends: There have been no other sightings in Walnut Cove
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Defined trianglur craft pulsing lights east to se with zig-zag dip and rise...
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dog out at 11:15 and after hooking him to his tie out turned to reenter my home and noticed the craft to the east. o be honest I was scared to death, never saw anything like this. I glanced for a second at my watch and noticed the second hand was jerking. I was very scared. The thing moved quickly, from the east in a slightly zig-zag pattern, light was or seemed to be a part of the body. It pulsed, but was wavey like the highway in summer. It stopped for just a moment hovering, then sped off to the se and upward faster than I have ever seen anything moveand vanished completely. I was stunned! I never really belived in these things...to be honest, I vomited. It was only visible to me for about a minute and a few seconds, but it felt like forever. I do not want my name published as I am an exfelon, and I think to associate my name will discredit the entire event. This is the single most frightening event in my life, I was not drinking or under the influence of any substance...and am certain of what I saw.
